Articles.Content:
i found a mod from .16 that i would like to have in .20, how would i go about updating it to work?

link here

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/15604-0-16-X-7-9-Scram-Jet-Assimilated-Inc
That download does contain the models in dae format and you'll basically need to redo it from unity onwards, the jet engine mechanics have completely changed.
Well crap, i was hoping it was a simple .cfg edit
